es.name: perro
es.definition: Cánido domesticable capaz de ladrar, generalmente con un buen sentido del oído y del olfato

en.name: dog
en.definition: Domesticable, carnivorous canid that is able to bark and typically has acute senses of smell and hearing

es.name: gato
es.definition: Felino domesticable de pequeño tamaño, orejas puntiagudas y cola larga, capaz de maullar

en.name: cat
en.definition: Domesticable, carnivorous feline of small size with pointed ears and a long tail, capable of meowing

es.name: vaca
es.definition: Mamífero rumiante domesticable, de gran tamaño, con cuernos lisos y capaz de mugir

en.name: cow
en.definition: Domesticable, ruminant mammal, that is large with smooth horns and able to moo

es.name: toro
es.definition: Mamífero rumiante domesticable, de gran tamaño, con cuernos lisos y capaz de mugir

en.name: bull
en.definition: Domesticable, ruminant mammal, that is large with smooth horns and able to moo

es.name: caballo
es.definition: Mamífero herbívoro equino, de gran tamaño, crines y cola de largas cerdas y empleado como montura o animal de carga

en.name: horse
en.definition: Large, herbivorous mammal that has a long mane and tail and is used for riding or as a pack animal

es.name: cerdo
es.definition: 'Mamífero de granja omnívoro de cuerpo pesado, generalmente rosa y corta cola curva, criado principalmente por su carne

en.name: pig
en.definition: Omnivorous farm mammal that has a heavy body with a generally pink color and a short, curved tail, raised mainly for its meat
